content.rendered:
Following our successful bid for a Nature Parks Grant last year, we purchased a range of gardening equipment. In order to gain the most from the this we have worked collaboratively with Links Therapy, who provide our Occupational Therapy (OT) and Speech and Language Therapy for the school.

The project has got off to a tentative start but the document below outlines how we intend to use Gardening at Lea Hall to meet pupils educational, therapeutic and social and emotional developmental needs.

We intend for this work to grow significantly over the coming years (pun fully intended)!!

Gardening project LH & Links
